ec91bbae-b1fa-4549-8cf4-eaaa8a7910b6.description: Cyber School is an 8-week virtual course that provides students with a foundational understanding of the core skills and knowledge that are in high demand on the job market in Switzerland. Through the assignments and class sessions, students will learn about key concepts, be exposed to real-world case studies and can apply and discuss topics with the instructor and students.
ec91bbae-b1fa-4549-8cf4-eaaa8a7910b6.name: Cyber School - Fundamentals

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Western Europe Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Understand the significance of cybersecurity and data protection for society and the economy.
Understand the importance of a diverse and dynamic cyber workforce.
Identify and evaluate core competencies and potential career paths in cybersecurity.
Identify and discuss foundational elements of cyber and information security, including confidentiality, integrity and availability, and key elements of responsible cyber governance
Analyze and evaluate the evolving threat landscape, various regulations and different best practices and tools for cyber resilience.
Analyze and evaluate the evolving threat landscape, various regulations and different best practices and tools for cyber resilience.
Identify and evaluate new innovations and opportunities for collaboration that support ecosystem cyber resilience

898adbec-0e2b-4a7e-b66a-9a099c3fc5a6.description: The Microsoft Business Applications Consultant program is a Dynamics 365 and Power Platform enablement program for Microsoft Partners in Switzerland. Participants experience, in hybrid mode, a well-rounded program for individuals with no or very little ERP/CRM/Low Code experience and skilling to a functional consultant level.
898adbec-0e2b-4a7e-b66a-9a099c3fc5a6.name: Microsoft Business Applications Modern Consultant Program

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Western Europe Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Can demonstrate foundational knowledge of Microsoft Dynamics 365, Power Platform applications, and the cloud computing model.

Community Building events and Microsoft mentoring program
Hands-on experience; by learning how to deliver product demos to customers and to enable teams with App-In-A-Day and RPA-In-A-Day

0169c299-bcea-4ffe-99b0-fb006c9b0dcf.description: The earner of this badge has completed the AI Business School Bootcamp. Together with Powercoders we put together a Bootcamp to level up skills. Our offer was limited and basically aimed for job seekers and social welfare recipients. This initiative enables people to learn new skills and upskill in order to regain a foothold in the working world. The bootcamp is based on the Microsoft AI Business school module and the classrooms were conducted by Powercoders and Microsoft.
0169c299-bcea-4ffe-99b0-fb006c9b0dcf.name: AI Business Bootcamp certification

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Western Europe Developer

badge_template_activities.title: This badge is exclusivly for participants who successfully completed the AI Business Bootcamp 2022 in Switzerland, together with Microsoft and Powercoders.

53e54c84-988c-4de8-91b2-2856d431f002.description: Earners of this exclusive badge have been participants of the Microsoft SPACE challenge during the global InCube Challenge 2021, organized by ETH Zurich Entrepreneurs Club. Over the course of a week, earners demonstrated outstanding creativity, teamwork and entrepreneurship skills by assessing the market, checking technical feasibility and building business models on how to leverage planetary data and "Space technology" to solve important real-world problems for a more sustainable future.
53e54c84-988c-4de8-91b2-2856d431f002.name: Microsoft Space Cubeist 2021

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Western Europe Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Lived and worked in a glass cube for five days with the team on the USI campus in Lugano, Switzerland.

Successfully worked on the Microsoft challenge 2021 on how to leverage SpaceTec and planetary data, such as satellite images from the Microsoft Planetary Computer, to make an positive impact on our society.
